title: `data-sveltekit-reload href="#id"` blocks subsequent `beforeNavigate`
body:
### Describe the bug Clicking on this anchor with a URL hash: ```svelte ``` 1. Blocks subsequent `beforeNavigate` from running 2. Results in the following `navigation` object ```jsonc { "from": { "params": {}, "route": { "id": "/" }, "url": "http://localhost:5174/" }, // Even if it is a data-sveltekit-reload anchor navigation, // params and route can be populated in a hash navigation. "to": { "params": null, "route": { "id": null }, "url": "http://localhost:5174/#message" }, "willUnload": true, // should be false "type": "link", "complete": {} } ``` --- This seems to be causing the following issue, - https://github.com/sveltejs/kit/issues/12188 because using plain HTML is a valid workaround. ```svelte {@html 'Show hidden message'} ``` --- ### Usage [Skip navigation](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/main#skip_navigation) using hash URL anchor. Fix `:target` CSS pseudo-class styling. - https://github.com/sveltejs/kit/issues/10550 - https://github.com/sveltejs/kit/issues/11848 ### Reproduction ```svelte
  1. Show hidden message
  2. Goto another page
This is the hidden message. ``` ```svelte

Press the browser's back button

You probably have to click it twice

``` ### Logs _No response_ ### System Info ```Shell System: OS: macOS 14.6.1 CPU: (10) arm64 Apple M1 Pro Memory: 202.06 MB / 16.00 GB Shell: 5.9 - /bin/zsh Binaries: Node: 20.16.0 - ~/.local/state/fnm_multishells/96031_1723864577634/bin/node npm: 10.8.1 - ~/.local/state/fnm_multishells/96031_1723864577634/bin/npm pnpm: 9.7.0 - ~/.local/state/fnm_multishells/96031_1723864577634/bin/pnpm Browsers: Chrome: 127.0.6533.120 Edge: 127.0.2651.105 Safari: 17.6 npmPackages: @sveltejs/adapter-auto: ^3.2.4 => 3.2.4 @sveltejs/kit: ^2.5.22 => 2.5.22 @sveltejs/vite-plugin-svelte: ^3.1.1 => 3.1.1 svelte: ^4.2.18 => 4.2.18 vite: ^5.4.0 => 5.4.0 ``` ### Severity serious, but I can work around it ### Additional Information _No response_
